wikipedia_page.main: Myles Fitzhugh Longfield Ponsonby, 12th Earl of Bessborough (born 16 February 1941), known as Viscount Duncannon from 1993 until 2002, is a British peer, holding an earldom and other titles in the Peerage of Ireland and the barony of Ponsonby of Sysonby in the Peerage of Great Britain, which until 1999 gave the head of the family a seat in the House of Lords.
